58329.「え？ なに？ 聞こえないわ。: What? What? I can't hear you.

58330.「オレも ついていっていいか！？\n って言ったんだよ！:
I said, "Can I come with you? I said, "Can I
go with you?

58331.「ついていくって……。\n あなた <pc>さんと一緒に\n 護衛の仕事に行くっ:
Are you saying you're going to go with
<pc> to work as an escort?

58332.「まもの使いとか 興味ないけどな。\n その……護衛とかは なんか興味あるし。:
I'm not interested in monster master. But...
I am interested in being an escort.

58334.「それでは <pc>さん。すみませんが\n ファーベルも 連れていってもらえます:
Okay then <pc>. Excuse me, but could
you take Fabel with you? She won't listen to
me once I start talking about it.

58335.「アンタの後ろから 適当に ついていくし。\n オレのことは 気にしないで\n:
I'll just follow along behind you. Don't worry
about me, just go to your destination.

58337.「コラッ！ ファーベル！\n あなた ちゃんと お礼を言って……: Korra! Fabel! You should have thanked me...

58338.「ハァ……。本当に 申し訳ありません。\n あの子 礼儀がなってなくて。\n 私:
I'm really sorry. That girl has no manners.
It's all my fault...

58339.「それでは <pc>さん。\n いろいろと よろしくお願いしますね。:
Well then <pc>. I look forward to
working with you in various ways.

58340.「護衛を待っている人との\n 待ち合わせ場所って ここか？:
Is this where you're supposed to meet the
people waiting for your escort?

58341.「……仲間の魔物さ\n アンタに よく なついてるみたいだな。\n 後ろで 見さ:
My companion, the monster, seems to be very
fond of you. I've been watching from the back.

58342.「うわっ！ 相変わらず ひどい道だなあ。\n これじゃあ 馬車が壊れちまうよ。:
Wow! The road is as bad as ever. I'm going to
break my wagon.

58343.「まもの使いってのは あなたのことですね？\n 魔物を連れてるから すぐに わか:
By "Monster Master," you mean you, don't you?
I recognized you because you have a monster
with you. I'm Tiltzkin. I'm a peddler.

58344.「……って あなたは <pc>さん！！\n 覚えてますか あたしのこと！？\n:
You're <pc>! Do you remember me? You
were lying on the ground, and I carried you to
the village...

58345.「いえ……ルーラストーンを ネコババした男\n と言ったほうが 思いだせそうです:
No...I think I would remember him better if I called him the man who catfished Zoomstone. Whatever the case may be, I remember him from
my past....

58346.「しばらく見ない間に ご立派になられましたね。\n あたしもね あれから 心を入:
You've become a great man in the time I haven't seen you for a while. I, too, have changed my mind since then and have been
devoting myself to my business. It's true.

58347.「今は ある名士の方の お抱え商人として\n 雇ってもらってましてね。今回 あな:
I'm currently employed as a merchant for a
prominent person. He is the one who made the
request to you this time.

58348.「……と言っても 今は ある名士の方に\n 雇われている身でしてね。今回 あなた:
However, I am currently employed by a
prominent person. He is the one who made the
request to you this time.

58349.「さてと…… それでは\n 今回の依頼について 説明しましょう。: Alright then, let me explain this request.

58350.「そちらには 護衛の仕事とだけ\n 話が いってるかもしれませんが 実際には\n:
You may have been told that you are only supposed to provide escort services, but in reality, we would like to ask you to perform a
cleaning service along the way.

58351.「あたし この辺で 採取をしたいんですがね\n なんでも ここには トガスのぬし:
I'd like to do some gathering around here, but
I hear there's a vicious monster called Togas
Dogus lurking around here...

58352.「そこで あなたに トガスのぬしを倒してもらい\n あたしが 気持ちよ～く\n:
So, I would like you to defeat Togas Dogus so
that I can concentrate on my work.

58353.「トガスのぬしは このトガス岩道の西\n トガの広場という所を 根城にしてるよう:
The Togas Dogus seem to have a stronghold at a
place called West Toga Square on Togas Rock
Road. Get ready and go there.

58354.「あたしは 身を潜めながら\n まもの使いの実力を 見せてもらいますので\n 仲:
I'm going to hide out and let you show me what
you can do as a Monster Master, so be sure to
take your fellow monster with you.

63714.「あれが トガスのぬしってヤツか。: So that's what they call the "Togus no Nushi.

63715.「へへっ。それじゃ <cs_pchero>さん。\n アンタと仲間の魔物が どん:
Hehe. Well then, <cs_pchero>. Let's see how
strong you and your companion monsters are.

63898.「おお！ トガスのぬしを倒しましたか！: Oh! You have defeated Togas Dogus!

63899.「いやはや <cs_pchero>さん。\n プクレット村にいた頃とは 見違えま:
Oh no <cs_pchero>. You look different now
than you did when you were in Pukulet village.

63900.「きっと たくさんの出会いと別れを経験し\n あなたは 強くなっていったのでしょ:
I am sure you must have experienced many
encounters and partings, and you have grown
stronger. I am deeply moved...deeply moved.

63901.「後ろから こっそり見ていましたが\n トガスのぬしが あんな化け物だったなんて:
I was watching from behind and was surprised
to see that Togas Dogus was such a monster.

63902.「いや しかし ウワサにたがわぬ その強さ。\n あの凶暴な魔物を ひるまず 倒:
No, but he is as strong as the rumors say. It is truly amazing that Monster Master can defeat such a ferocious monster without
flinching.

63903.「あたしの雇い主……シガール様にも\n 今回の活躍ぶりを 報告しておきますよ。\:
I will report your success to my employer, Mr.
Sigal. I'm sure he will be very pleased.

63904.「おっと…… そろそろ 仕事に戻らないと。\n それでは あたしは行きますね。\:
Oops... I should get back to work. Well then,
I'll be going. See you again sometime
<cs_pchero>.

63905.「おっと…… そろそろ 仕事に戻らないと。\n それでは あたしは行きますね。\:
Oops... I should get back to work. Well then,
I'll be going. I'll see you again someday,
Monster Master.

63907.「アンタは どうして\n まもの使いなんてやってるんだ？\n 魔物を信じるって:
Why are you a monster master? Aren't you
afraid to believe in monsters?<yesno><close>

63908.「オレも……昔は まもの使いの修業をしてた。\n でも 急に 仲間の魔物が\n:
I used to train to be a Monster Master. But
suddenly, my companion monsters stopped
listening to me...

63909.「一緒にいた人を 傷つけちまったんだ。: I hurt someone I was with.

63910.「もう あんな悲しい思いはしたくないから\n 魔物にも……まもの使いにも\n 関:
I don't want to go through that sadness
anymore, so I've decided not to get involved
with monsters...or Monster Masters.

63912.「そうですか……。一緒にいた人を\n 自分の仲間の魔物が 傷つけてしまった……。:
I see... the person you were with was hurt by
your own companion monster... that's what she
said.

63913.「じつは…… ファーベルの言う\n 一緒にいた人というのは あの子の父親のことで:
Actually... the person Fabel's Father was with
is the boy's father, and the companion monster
was Fry.

63914.「……ファーベルが 私のお腹にいる時でした。\n 夫が 母親を失った魔物のタマゴ:
It was when Fabel was in my belly. My husband
brought home one of the eggs of a motherless
monster.

63915.「そして ファーベルが産まれると ほぼ同時に\n そのタマゴからも 一匹のドラゴ:
And at about the same time that Fabel was
born, a dragon was born from that egg. That
was Fry.

63916.「キッズとファーベルは 兄弟のように仲がよく\n あの子が成長して まもの使いに:
Fry and Fabel were like siblings, and even
after the boy grew up and became a Monster
Master, the two remained in perfect harmony.

63917.「ですが そんな矢先に 事件が起きたのです。\n こちらに越してきて 夫と ファ:
But then something happened. When I first
moved here, my husband, Fabel and Fry went to
train...

63918.「……突然 キッズが言うことを聞かなくなり\n ファーベルに襲いかかってきたので:
...Suddenly Fry stopped listening and attacked
Fabel.

63919.「ファーベルをかばうために\n あの子の前に 立ちふさがった 夫は\n その時:
The husband, who had stood in front of the
child to Cover for Fabel, was deeply wounded
at the time.

63920.「夫は 負傷しながらも\n 暴れるキッズを 当て身で気絶させ\n なんとか その:
My husband, though wounded, managed to stun
the rampaging Fry with a hit to the head.

63921.「なぜか あの人は キズの手当てもしないまま\n ファーベルに 家に戻るよう告げ:
For some reason, the man told Fabel to go back
to his house and left without treating the
wound.

63922.「それから 夫の帰らぬ日々が続き\n ついに あの人は 遺体で発見されました……:
Then, after many days of no return, he was
finally found dead...

63923.「ファーベルは 自分の未熟さから\n 父親の死を招いたのだと 自らを責め それ以:
Fabel blamed himself for his father's death on
his own immaturity, and has since closed the
door on becoming a Monster Master.

63924.「あんなに 仲のよかったキッズが\n あの子を襲ったなんて 信じたくありませんが:
I don't want to believe that Fry, who I was so
close to, attacked that girl, but everyone
makes mistakes.

63925.「クヨクヨせずに あの人と同じ\n まもの使いになってほしいと 私は\n 今でも:
I still hope that I can become a Monster
Master just like him without worrying about
it...

63926.「いけない！ すっかり 話し込んじゃいました。\n ごめんなさい <pc>さんっ:
I shouldn't! I'm sorry, I've been talking too
much. I'm sorry. I don't know why
<pc> is so easy to talk to...

63927.「あなたの優しさに 甘えちゃって……。\n いけませんね こんなことじゃ。:
I've been spoiled by your kindness... It's not
right, this kind of thing.

76218.「それじゃ 暗い話は ここまでにして\n 今は この勢いのまま まもの使いのよさ:
So, let's put the gloomy talk to rest and just
keep up the momentum and spread the goodness
of the Monster Master!

76219.「というわけで <pc>さん。\n ウデをみがいて 時が来たら\n また チカラ:
So, <pc>. I hope you'll brush up on
your skills, and when the time comes, lend me
your help again!
